CustomField.formula:
IF ( NOT(Negoptim__Is_Tariff_Condition__c) && NOT(Negoptim__Is_FlatPrice_Condition__c) && (Negoptim__Index__c = 'Index2') , - Negoptim__YTD_Nego__c / Negoptim__Contract__r.Negoptim__Total_TO__c ,
IF ( NOT(Negoptim__Is_Tariff_Condition__c) && Negoptim__Is_FlatPrice_Condition__c && (Negoptim__Index__c = 'Index1') , Negoptim__Index_perc__c * (1-Negoptim__Contract__r.Negoptim__Index2_perc__c-Negoptim__Contract__r.Negoptim__Index3_perc__c - Negoptim__Contract__r.Negoptim__Index4_perc__c) ,
IF ( Negoptim__Contract__r.Negoptim__Supplier_Nego_Scope__r.Negoptim__Is_Managing_FlatPrice_Rate_Promo__c && NOT(Negoptim__Is_Tariff_Condition__c) && Negoptim__Is_FlatPrice_Condition__c && OR(Negoptim__Index__c = 'Index3',Negoptim__Index__c = 'Index4',Negoptim__Index__c = 'Index5',Negoptim__Index__c = 'Index6',Negoptim__Index__c = 'Index7') , Negoptim__YTD_Nego__c / Negoptim__Contract__r.Negoptim__Total_TO__c ,
NULL
)))
CustomField.label: FlatPrice Rate Promo Correction
